mapper.select: SELECT * FROM show_tb AS s JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON s.id = sd.show_id WHERE sd.show_id = #{showId}
SELECT s.id, sd.show_date FROM show_tb AS s JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON s.id = sd.show_id WHERE sd.show_id = #{showId} GROUP BY show_date
SELECT sd.id, sd.show_time FROM show_tb AS s JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON s.id = sd.show_id WHERE sd.show_id = #{showId} AND sd.show_date = #{showDate} GROUP BY show_time ORDER BY show_time ASC

SELECT * FROM seat_tb AS st JOIN hole_tb AS h ON h.id = st.hole_id JOIN show_tb AS sw ON sw.hole_id = h.id JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON sd.show_id = sw.id WHERE sw.id = #{showId} AND sd.id = #{showDatetimeId}

SELECT t.ticketing_date,u.nickname,u.tel,u.email,sd.show_date,sd.show_time,s.title,s.adult_rate,s.youth_rate, count(case when t.age_group_id=2 then 1 end) as youthCount, count(case when t.age_group_id=3 then 1 end) as adultCount FROM show_tb AS s join show_datetime_tb AS sd ON sd.show_id = s.id left Join ticketing_tb AS t ON t.show_datetime_id = sd.id left JOIN age_group_tb AS a ON t.age_group_id = a.id Join user_tb AS u ON u.id = t.user_id where t.payment_status = 1 group by s.id, sd.show_date,sd.show_time,u.nickname order by t.id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticketing_tb (user_id, show_id, seat_id, age_group_id, show_datetime_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{showId}, #{seatId}, #{ageGroupId}, #{showDatetimeId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ticketing_tb as t JOIN show_tb as s ON t.show_id = s.id LEFT JOIN seat_tb as se ON t.seat_id = se.seat_id JOIN hole_tb as h ON h.id = s.hole_id JOIN show_datetime_tb as sd ON t.show_datetime_id = sd.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND payment_status = 0 ORDER BY ticketing_date DESC

SELECT * FROM ticketing_tb as t JOIN show_tb as s ON t.show_id = s.id LEFT JOIN seat_tb as se ON t.seat_id = se.seat_id JOIN hole_tb as h ON h.id = s.hole_id JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON t.show_datetime_id = sd.id JOIN user_tb AS u ON t.user_id = u.id WHERE t.id = #{ticketingId}
SELECT * FROM ticketing_tb ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM ticketing_tb AS t JOIN show_tb AS s ON t.show_id = s.id JOIN user_tb AS u ON t.user_id = u.id JOIN seat_tb AS seat ON seat.seat_id = t.seat_id JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON sd.id = t.show_datetime_id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON h.id = s.hole_id WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, s.show_type_id AS showTypeId FROM show_tb AS s JOIN ticketing_tb AS t ON t.show_id = s.id JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON sd.id = t.show_datetime_id WHERE sd.id=#{showDatetimeId}

SELECT t.user_id, s.img_route, s.title, s.content,l.location, h.name, se.seat_name, sd.show_date, sd.show_time, c.show_type, r.content AS reviewContent, t.show_id, r.rating FROM ticketing_tb AS t JOIN payment_tb AS p ON t.id = p.ticketing_id JOIN show_tb AS s ON t.show_id = s.id JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON sd.id = t.show_datetime_id JOIN seat_tb AS se ON t.seat_id = se.seat_id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON h.id = se.hole_id JOIN location_tb AS l ON l.id = h.location_id JOIN category_tb AS c ON c.id = s.show_type_id LEFT JOIN review_tb AS r ON r.show_id = s.id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.payment_status = 1 AND sd.show_date < curdate() ORDER BY r.content ASC, show_date DESC
